lemma noread_exists_change_respecting: assumes fin: "finite (X :: 'Var set)" assumes eval: "\<langle> c, mds, mem \<rangle> \<leadsto> \<langle> c', mds', mem' \<rangle>" assumes noread: "\<forall> x \<in> X. doesnt_read_or_modify c x" shows "change_respecting \<langle>c, mds, mem\<rangle> \<langle>c', mds', mem'\<rangle> X"
